text: Zbigniew Stefan Messner (13 March 1929 - 10 January 2014) was a Polish economist and politician. He was a member of the Central Committee of Polish United Workers' Party from 1981 until 1988. This is a Communist party. Messner was deputy prime minister from 1983 to 1985, and Prime Minister from 1985 to 1988. He was born in Stryj. ==Other websites== * Photograph and short biography of Zbigniew Messner Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Births in Poland Category:Polish communists Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Prime ministers of Poland
title: Zbigniew Messner
